content.Name: client_id
content.Description: Your tap-auth0 M2M application client ID

content.Name: client_secret
content.Description: Your tap-auth0 M2M application client secret

content.Name: domain
content.Description: Your Auth0 tenant domain in the format <TENANT_NAME>.<REGION_IDENTIFIER>.auth0.com

content.Name: job_poll_interval_ms
content.Description: The interval in milliseconds between requests made to get a job when polling for a non-pending status

content.Name: job_poll_max_count
content.Description: The number of requests made to get a job when polling for a non-pending status
